title: Hold Your Breath
plot: In 1930s Oklahoma amid the region's horrific dust storms, a woman is convinced that a sinister presence is threatening her family.

subtitles.author: tedi
lines:
132917 136750 Dear Lord,
we ask that you keep the storms at bay.
139625 142333 We thank you for bringing Henry this job.

145792 148875 Bring Henry in safety
to his journey's end.
150208 152333 Let him earn enough to finish our home.
157542 161667 Help me to see the gifts you've given me rather than the things you've taken away.
163042 166792 Help me to keep Rose and Ollie healthy and safe.
167625 170292 Don't let them fall ill like the other children.
174667 177875 Rose, toss down some hay, sweetheart.
180667 182042 We have to make it last.
189458 192500 if it means you won't touch a hair on their heads.
207792 210854 Promise her that I will fend off my human proneness
210855 213917 for evil so that we can be together again.
227042 230875 And when I lie awake tonight, banish worry from my heart.
240333 242458 I asked your daddy to patch this.
259792 261500 I wanna see what it's like.
288875 291667 Follow my finger as I read, okay?
297708 299707 "The Grey Man locked his lovely wife

299708 303667 and five children in the bedroom,
then gathered embers from the fire.

304333 308833 He aimed to burn the six angels up,
but fate had one more victim in mind.

311958 314417 the Grey Man
realized his shirt was caught.

319375 323542 Now, during a dust storm,
the Grey Man's ashes blow together.

325833 328583 If you don't wear your mask,
you'll breathe him in,
328584 330750 and he'll make you do terrible things."

386208 389875 I won't put them in a tent,
lose what little we have.
393000 395000 And I won't leave her out there.

461792 464792 So, how'd
Henry get off last week?
466625 468292 There were quite a few heading out.

474708 476625 - Oh, I'm so sorry.
- That's all right.
476626 478958 Just... It's hard to keep up with.
485625 487332 He's been at that all night.
487333 489791 Is it that cold that was going around?

489792 492625 It started out like that,
but it's just... it's just gotten worse.

498958 501250 Doctor says it's
just too much dust in the air.
501750 503333 What are we meant to do about that?

570625 573458 Well, they should go see
that faith healer over in Guymon.

573459 576958 He pulled the arthritis
right out of an old man's fingers.
581625 584083 It's good you brought the girls, Margaret.
591333 593625 I guess you haven't heard about Calabash.
593626 595332 The daddy said the door was locked.

595333 597875 But the drifter
got into the house somehow.

599167 601229 They found him
eating crackers over the baby.

601230 603292 No, Birdie,
he'd already finished the crackers.
603293 605000 He was just looking at the baby.

606708 609500 Hunger don't explain
staring at a baby like that.

610458 613792 And it certainly don't
explain what he did after.

619875 623417 and made him watch
while he killed the mama and the kids.
626167 628000 Can't keep up with chores as it is.

628542 630667 How am I supposed
to watch out for fiends too?
643833 647375 It's like he just melted into the dust.

677333 679583 The wind is terrible.
There must be a storm coming.

680750 683833 But people die in them and
you'll be exposed on that cart, Esther.

687000 690458 All you need to do is make sure
Thomas and Jacob stay inside.

693333 695500 Even so,
it seeps through everything.
695501 697667 Keep finding it in the oddest places.
700292 703833 I had a dream last night that, um...

709875 713958 I took a handkerchief,
and I stuffed it in his mouth.
728333 730542 I just got to get my boys outta here.

789000 791958 Girls, grab the twine
or you'll get lost in the dust!
904167 905875 You scared her with this, Rose.
907917 910042 Didn't I tell you to get rid of this?
915125 917542 This should help with the dust, okay?
961167 962667 Will you tell us about the wheat?

975292 977833 The first year we planted,
it just took hold.

986833 991542 When the wind blew,
the weeds would wave like the ocean.

996500 1001208 And one day, we played hide-and-seek
in the tall grass for hours.
1007292 1011083 You could hide inches away, and I couldn't see you.
1012792 1014958 But I could always hear you giggling.

1233000 1235542 Cart must have gotten
overturned in the storm last night.

1243167 1245208 I found Thomas
hiding under the cart alone,

1245750 1248000 so scared I could barely
get him to come out.

1248917 1251500 Probably left him there when
she went to go look for Jacob.

1297792 1299917 The Lord
works in mysterious ways.
1309583 1312457 All you can do is hold faith.
1312458 1315083 Faith that He has a plan for Jacob.

1315875 1319625 A plan more important
than we may ever understand.

1320250 1324333 - I guess some things...
- ...are just out of our hands.

1328292 1331125 You can't just have faith
that He'll do something,
1331792 1334000 that it's part of the plan or they'll die.
1344583 1346292 I can't change the weather, Margaret.
1410583 1412083 Fit as a couple of fiddles.
1431792 1434833 After Ollie and Ada, I just...

1437167 1439583 Ada used to have
nosebleeds just like this.

1442000 1447000 Esther mentioned something
about the dust making Thomas ill.
1453625 1457000 I got some masks for sale.

1468958 1473000 I say keep the house sealed
best you can, wear the masks.

1508167 1510833 We're not even supposed to
sleep in the same room as you.

1510834 1513500 There was only enough fabric
to seal one room.

1516125 1519125 What if it happens again?
What if you stop sleeping?

1523458 1526583 Don't you understand that
the dust seeps through every opening?

1527208 1531542 That's why your cousin, Thomas, is sick
and it's why your nose is bleeding.

1532083 1535792 Well, I want to leave.
I want to go to Dad.

1537083 1539958 Well, when your father sends more money,
we'll take the next train.

1566875 1569583 We're going to try to leave
when Henry's next letter arrives.

1571833 1576499 Well, I guess you hadn't heard.
Service has been halted indefinitely.

1576500 1581145 Dust built up so much, a train in Woodward
skipped plumb off the tracks.

1581146 1585792 Killed every soul on board except for
one donkey in the freight car.
1585793 1588417 You're stuck with us, looks like.

1605000 1609708 Well, now they're wondering
if the daddy did it himself.

1610708 1614167 Killed those kids and made up
the intruder wholesale.

1615000 1618333 Our neighbor said he'd been
acting off right before,
1625875 1629250 No one saw that drifter coming or going.

1725333 1727167 - Didn't I ask you to tie the doors?
- I did.
1727168 1729082 That cow is keeping us alive.

1729083 1731667 She's already starving
and something could have gotten to her.

1731668 1733167 - She could have died.
- I tied it.
1733168 1734687 Well, then it has to be tighter. What?
1748917 1750333 You need to finish your chores.
1783583 1785375 Toss down some hay, would you?
1846333 1848667 In the barn, who did you see?
1860458 1862167 But I thought you said he wasn't real.
1863125 1864667 That doesn't mean no one's out th...

1883792 1888458 Come out or I will burn this whole thing
to the ground, I swear to God.
1908625 1910708 I told you to stay downstairs.
1945917 1947250 I mean you no harm, ma'am.
1951417 1953458 Henry told me y'all had this barn.

1960958 1964000 Of course not, ma'am.
I'm a man of the cloth.

1965708 1969708 I, uh, stopped through the works detail
on my way west
1969709 1972417 and, Brother Henry, he give me this,
1973958 1976000 and he asked me to check in on y'all.
1976917 1978749 Why not just knock on the door?

1978750 1982917 That was my intention, ma'am,
soon as I had a chance to recover.

1983833 1988042 See, I got caught in that storm
on account of my bad leg.

1990708 1994125 I didn't want to scare your girls,
uh, scare you.

2009333 2011500 The mail is slow going
with the trains out.

2018542 2022083 I could earn my keep.
People need the Word of God these days.

2022084 2025625 - People need rain.
- One follows the other, ma'am.

2033000 2037875 It's just your cow's starving,
which means you're about to be.

2042333 2045125 The milk's dried up.
I could get her producing again.

2046458 2049207 - Okay. It's okay, it's okay.
- Oh, darlin'.

2071292 2073292 Even if you don't believe,
what could it hurt?
2124625 2126865 What did you do to her?
2155958 2158250 You said you could get our cow producing.

2174625 2178292 Tumbleweeds will soak this water right up.
Yield a lot of feed.

2189625 2193333 I sleep with this,
and I know how to use it.
2203625 2206750 People will talk if I let you stay.
2209167 2210958 I could keep out of sight for a bit.
2345125 2346165 What a fine hand you have.

2347833 2352458 Oh.
It's just our dream for the house.
2355917 2358000 Missed you in church this week, Margaret.

2371708 2375417 Where's Esther?
How did he get here by himself?
2382958 2385042 She's not looking after him, Margaret.

2385750 2388958 Maybe find out if it's
a short-term grief kind of aberration

2428042 2431000 For a long while,
I thought I might just join her.
2433208 2436083 But you have to think of your other child.
2441667 2446167 The man has... been looking after him.
2475167 2477083 How long have you been lying here?

2496083 2499125 I'd take him,
but we can't feed him.

2500667 2502833 Come with me, little Thomas.
Yeah.

2509708 2513583 Thank you.
Thank you for visiting me.

2516375 2519583 It's all right.
You just have to take care of yourself.
2523000 2524680 Just for a little while, Esther.
2528042 2530000 Just until you get back on your feet.
2533125 2536667 Are you taking him? Where you taking him?

2538750 2541333 I won't... Oh. Hey.
Let's just take a moment here.
2543708 2547041 He's my son. He's all I've got left.

2547042 2549958 You're no different than me,
you know. You know that?

2550917 2554125 You're no different than me.
You always thought you were.
2556292 2559167 You'll be just like me, you hear me?
2559168 2560707 I'll show you what it's like.
2560708 2564125 Look at me. You'll be just like me.

2565875 2569667 You'll be just like me.
You'll see. You'll be sorry.
2583125 2586292 "Count it all joy when you fall into various trials,

2586875 2590542 knowing that the testing of your faith
produces patience."
2603875 2605792 Is she how you got into the church?

2608583 2612333 My daddy was a preacher.
He told me I had the touch young.
2613208 2616625 All my siblings do. I have four sisters.

2621208 2625167 Two are in Texas
and, uh, scarlet fever took the others
2625168 2626833 while I was off spreading the Word.
2647500 2651917 Ollie had it. Scarlet fever. And Ada.

2657208 2660667 When they went into quarantine,
Ada never stopped calling out for me.

2664750 2670958 I clawed the door separating us until
my nails were ripped away from the quick.

2671458 2674208 Temporary parting is a burden
of our earthly lives.

2675917 2679792 But there's a reunion
that lasts an eternity.
2691750 2693417 Those girls are lucky to have you.
2710917 2716833 After Ada, my sleep was fitful.

2727667 2732000 No mail today. But the letter carrier said
a haze is dropping in.

2748083 2750458 I thank you for the warmth
of the Bellum family.

2751750 2755333 You connected us through Brother Henry,
and for that, I am eternally grateful.
2757583 2759625 Thank you for Rose's continued health,

2760708 2764792 and we ask that you hold little Ollie
in your ever-loving light.

2767417 2769833 I'm reminded of a verse
that my father taught me.
2771333 2773667 "Neither this man nor his parents sinned,

2774333 2779292 but this happened so that the works of God
might be displayed in Him."

2787292 2789666 - Ooh, is that from Daddy?
- Mm-hmm.

2789667 2791625 - Mm-mmm. Next one, little...
- What's he got to say?

2811375 2817500 my first hope is that
you can... d... deci... "

2825333 2829458 "My second hope is that these
blades of grass will still be green

2829459 2831375 - by the time they reach you."
- Mmm.
2831376 2833041 "Just know that when I picked them,

2833042 2835500 they were the brightest thing
you ever saw."
2836875 2839208 "This next bit's just for Mama, girls."
2880333 2882042 That seems like a bad idea.

2886917 2890957 "I'm fine, Margaret,
but my jacket was took.

2890958 2895625 Along with the letter in its pocket,
money, and sweets for the girls.

2895626 2899000 There was a preacher hanging about,
asked to stay the night.

2899500 2902542 Next day, my bunkmate didn't
come back from lunch.

2903833 2908917 Found him with his head cracked open
like an egg, boots pulled off his feet.

2909875 2913750 Nobody knows how the preacher made off.
Like he just vanished."
2928792 2931625 I will. In exchange for that letter.
2932750 2935292 We better hold on to it.

2961375 2964750 Without you, his first letter
would have gotten to us.

2966292 2968875 "Do not neglect
to show hospitality to strangers,

2968876 2971250 for thereby some have
entertained angels, unaware."

2971251 2973583 - Angels.
- I fixed her, didn't I?
2976458 2977957 Put her back the way she was.
2982708 2985167 Your father, the preacher, a con too?
3022667 3026333 Don't know when a man could come by.
3038500 3040250 That's not gonna stop the Grey Man.

3220833 3227625 You'll see. You'll breathe him in. He'll
make you do terrible things.
3364208 3367875 Open the door! Unlock it, please!
3399083 3400708 Did you knock the lamp over?
3407333 3408833 I was up the whole night.
3413333 3414750 And the doors are still locked.
3416667 3418667 Unless he doesn't have to use doors.
3424417 3428000 I should have sealed under this door.

3430875 3435458 Mom. But the... the Grey Man's
just a story, like... like you said.
3436208 3438167 I-I lent Wallace the book one day.

3454958 3459292 And he came into a locked house
while I stood watch.

3469083 3473750 Slide fabric under the door
and don't come out.

3492833 3498875 The things that I was thinking and...
...the things I said, I'm sorry.

3500083 3503625 Can't we put this all behind us
and just start fresh? I miss you.
3512417 3515208 They haven't seen you in a while.
3529125 3532833 It's difficult with such low light.
3534417 3536000 It's much easier to breathe though.
3542292 3546125 I wonder if it might help to get out more.

3548000 3551291 It's wild what happens upstairs
when you're allowed to stew.

3551292 3554583 It might be good to take the lid off
and let some of that steam out.

3555708 3557499 You know,
I've been trying to get out more too.

3557500 3560250 I've been working with the preacher,
praying to get my head right.

3571167 3573333 You might could start
with the dance tonight.

3574542 3579000 Take it from me, you don't want people
speculating the way they have been.
3579001 3581083 You might want to show 'em you're okay.
3584500 3586750 We really should get out more.
3598000 3599707 We're really going to the dance?

3599708 3602792 Esther said
people were worried about us, so...
3603667 3606042 We have to put on a good face and go.
3608667 3610208 Well, Sheriff Bell will be there.
3611792 3613917 We could tell him about Wallace,
3619042 3620958 Without the letter from your father...

3624000 3627166 If the sheriff thought
something was wrong, or...

3627167 3633167 He could take you both.
Promise me you won't mention it.
3644417 3647792 Oh. I think it's the wearer.

3700750 3705042 You were crying out!
You were choking! You couldn't breathe!
3725000 3726833 I don't think we should still go.

3755250 3758625 Daddy will be home soon,
and we'll sort everything out.

3760875 3764792 Until then, I just need to go
and show everyone we're okay.
3794000 3795667 Y'all look right as rain, Margaret.

3797083 3799750 - We're feeling much better. Thank you.
- Hmm. Mm-hmm.
3809125 3810792 Would you, uh, care to go for a spin?

3824333 3828792 Oh, we had a little bug,
but we're feeling much better.

3829417 3832297 Glad to hear it.
Have you been getting enough rest lately?

3841542 3845208 Oh, nothing.
She... She's been having nightmares lately.
3904333 3906042 What are you doing with him?
3919125 3921333 I didn't want the girls to miss the dance,

3922167 3924917 but this cut
h-has me a little light-headed.

3928500 3932750 Why don't I stop by later
with that healer that I mentioned?

3943542 3946542 He's real nice.
He got me thinking right again and...

3947417 3951917 He even helps me keep up the house
and he got me this.
3955875 3957832 I don't care what he's calling himself.

3957833 3961000 That is the man who was
hiding in our loft, Sheriff.

3972375 3975917 Henry sent me a letter.
Your healer killed a man at his ca...
3975918 3978292 No, she... she's telling the truth.

3980125 3984458 I saw him too.
And... And he threatened to come back.

3994042 3998833 He's been sneaking into our house,
moving things at night,
4002708 4006583 He can get through locks, closed windows.

4009125 4012833 - He seeps in through the cracks.
- Mom, please. Please, come on.
4016625 4018750 He'll make you do terrible things.
4045917 4047500 But I said I saw him too.
4134583 4136417 But what if it's someone checking on us?

4138667 4142542 Put your masks on. Slide fabric
under the door the moment I leave.
4457542 4459583 - Don't shoot, it's Rose! - Don't shoot, it's Rose!
4459584 4461417 - It's your daughter! - It's your daughter!
4464333 4465792 - Put the gun down. - Put the gun down.
4466708 4469250 - Mommy, I'm really scared. - Mommy, I'm really scared.
4469251 4470707 - You have to trust me! - You have to trust me!
4470708 4471958 - You have to wake up! - You have to wake up!
4490917 4493042 Rose, what are you doing out here?
4494833 4497833 The Grey Man isn't haunting us.

4502458 4505291 You're
doing things in your sleep again.

4505292 4508125 That's how the chairs moved
and how the bed caught fire.

4517375 4522125 You can never say that again
about the sleepwalking.
4527083 4528917 Mom, why are you doing this?

4540167 4542708 - I was trying to keep us all together.
- Mom.

4567542 4570542 - Cutaway pieces that never heal.
- Mom, you're scaring me.

4579333 4582417 ...suffocating under
the dirt with your sister.
4700626 4703000 They will take you away. Please.
4768667 4770333 You two just go wait in there.

4776792 4779083 We're just gonna have
a nice little chat, all right?
4782625 4785458 I don't know what's gotten into her.

4806500 4810249 Did, uh, did...
did Esther come by, Margaret?
4810250 4813125 She-She said she was gonna check in.
4813126 4815958 I hope she wasn't lost in the storm.

4849458 4853000 Margaret, it's just a few days now,
just a few days.
4853001 4855458 You done good. You done real good.
4933125 4935750 They're going to hang me, Rose.
4938500 4940833 But there is a way around it,
4946125 4949292 A reunion that lasts an eternity.
4952458 4956875 We just go to sleep like any other night,
5002458 5005707 I'm so sorry for everything, Rose.

5005708 5009792 You're the loves of my life,
you know that.
5035167 5037833 Let's go be with Ada. All right?
5064875 5067250 Can you tell us about the wheat first?
5078167 5081667 Our first year, it just took hold.

5086125 5092375 And when the wind blew, the wheat
would ripple and wave like the ocean.
5092376 5097375 And we'd play in that field for hours.

5100750 5103667 Could we have the medicine
in some peaches?
5108875 5111292 I think that's a wonderful idea.

5142333 5145042 I-I tried to stop her,
but Ollie got scared and ran out.
5145043 5147917 She has to be with us.

subtitles.author: tedi
lines:
132917 136750 [parent] Dear Lord,
we ask that you keep the storms at bay.
139625 142333 We thank you for bringing Henry this job.

145792 148875 Bring Henry in safety
to his journey's end.
150208 152333 Let him earn enough to finish our home.
157542 161667 Help me to see the gifts you've given me rather than the things you've taken away.
163042 166792 Help me to keep Rose and Ollie healthy and safe.
167625 170292 Don't let them fall ill like the other children.
174667 177875 Rose, toss down some hay, sweetheart.
180667 182042 We have to make it last.
189458 192500 if it means you won't touch a hair on their heads.
207792 210854 Promise her that I will fend off my human proneness
210855 213917 for evil so that we can be together again.
227042 230875 [parent] And when I lie awake tonight, banish worry from my heart.
240333 242458 [sighs] I asked your daddy to patch this.
259792 261500 [Rose] I wanna see what it's like.
288875 291667 [Rose] Follow my finger as I read, okay?
297708 299707 "The Grey Man locked his lovely wife

299708 303667 and five children in the bedroom,
then gathered embers from the fire.

304333 308833 He aimed to burn the six angels up,
but fate had one more victim in mind.

311958 314417 the Grey Man
realized his shirt was caught.

319375 323542 Now, during a dust storm,
the Grey Man's ashes blow together.

325833 328583 If you don't wear your mask,
you'll breathe him in,
328584 330750 and he'll make you do terrible things."

386208 389875 I won't put them in a tent,
lose what little we have.
393000 395000 And I won't leave her out there.

461792 464792 [neighbor] So, how'd
Henry get off last week?
466625 468292 There were quite a few heading out.

474708 476625 - [neighbor] Oh, I'm so sorry.
- That's all right.

476626 478958 Just... It's hard to keep up with.
[chuckles]
485625 487332 He's been at that all night.
487333 489791 Is it that cold that was going around?

489792 492625 It started out like that,
but it's just... it's just gotten worse.

492626 494625 - It's pneumonia, Dr. Cox says.
- [child coughs]

498958 501250 Doctor says it's
just too much dust in the air.
501750 503333 What are we meant to do about that?

570625 573458 [churchgoer 1] Well, they should go see
that faith healer over in Guymon.

573459 576958 He pulled the arthritis
right out of an old man's fingers.
581625 584083 It's good you brought the girls, Margaret.
591333 593625 I guess you haven't heard about Calabash.
593626 595332 The daddy said the door was locked.

595333 597875 But the drifter
got into the house somehow.

599167 601229 They found him
eating crackers over the baby.

601230 603292 No, Birdie,
he'd already finished the crackers.
603293 605000 He was just looking at the baby.

606708 609500 [churchgoer 1] Hunger don't explain
staring at a baby like that.

610458 613792 [churchgoer 1] And it certainly don't
explain what he did after.
617333 619000 [smacks lips] He tied the daddy up

619875 623417 and made him watch
while he killed the mama and the kids.
626167 628000 Can't keep up with chores as it is.

628542 630667 How am I supposed
to watch out for fiends too?
643833 647375 It's like he just melted into the dust.

677333 679583 [Margaret] The wind is terrible.
There must be a storm coming.

680750 683833 But people die in them and
you'll be exposed on that cart, Esther.

687000 690458 All you need to do is make sure
Thomas and Jacob stay inside.

693333 695500 [sighs] Even so,
it seeps through everything.
695501 697667 Keep finding it in the oddest places.
700292 703833 I had a dream last night that, um...

709875 713958 I took a handkerchief,
and I stuffed it in his mouth.
728333 730542 I just got to get my boys outta here.

789000 791958 [Margaret] Girls, grab the twine
or you'll get lost in the dust!
904167 905875 You scared her with this, Rose.
907917 910042 Didn't I tell you to get rid of this?
915125 917542 This should help with the dust, okay?
961167 962667 Will you tell us about the wheat?

975292 977833 The first year we planted,
it just took hold.

986833 991542 When the wind blew,
the weeds would wave like the ocean.

996500 1001208 And one day, we played hide-and-seek
in the tall grass for hours.
1007292 1011083 [Margaret] You could hide inches away, and I couldn't see you.
1012792 1014958 [Margaret] But I could always hear you giggling.

1233000 1235542 [sheriff] Cart must have gotten
overturned in the storm last night.

1243167 1245208 I found Thomas
hiding under the cart alone,

1245750 1248000 so scared I could barely
get him to come out.

1248917 1251500 Probably left him there when
she went to go look for Jacob.

1297792 1299917 [Birdie] The Lord
works in mysterious ways.
1309583 1312457 All you can do is hold faith.
1312458 1315083 Faith that He has a plan for Jacob.

1315875 1319625 A plan more important
than we may ever understand.

1320250 1324333 I guess some things...
[sniffles]...are just out of our hands.

1328292 1331125 You can't just have faith
that He'll do something,
1331792 1334000 that it's part of the plan or they'll die.

1344583 1346292 [Esther]
I can't change the weather, Margaret.
1410583 1412083 Fit as a couple of fiddles.
1431792 1434833 After Ollie and Ada, I just...

1437167 1439583 Ada used to have
nosebleeds just like this.

1442000 1447000 Esther mentioned something
about the dust making Thomas ill.

1453625 1457000 [Dr. Cox exhales]
I got some masks for sale.
1467583 1468957 [Dr. Cox] Well, you want my advice?
